
# Glossary

## By Title 

```{r,results='asis', message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
library(pander)
library(knitr)

meta_data <- read.csv("02_songs_output/meta_data.csv") 

meta_data2 <- meta_data %>%
  arrange(title) %>%
  transmute(title = paste0("[",title,"](",label,")"),artist)
if(opts_knit$get("rmarkdown.pandoc.to") == "html"){
   meta_data2%>%
    kable(escape = FALSE)
} else{
  meta_data2 %>%
    pmap_chr(function(title,artist){paste0(title,ifelse(!is.na(artist),paste0(" (",artist,")"),""))}) %>%
    pander::pandoc.list()
}

```

## By Artist

```{r,results='asis', message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

meta_data2 <- meta_data %>%
  filter(!is.na(artist)) %>%
  arrange(artist) %>%
  transmute(artist, title = paste0("[",title,"](",label,")"))
if(opts_knit$get("rmarkdown.pandoc.to") == "html"){
   meta_data2%>%
  kable(escape = FALSE)
} else{
  meta_data2 %>%
    pmap_chr(function(artist,title){paste0(artist," ", title)}) %>%
    pander::pandoc.list()
}
```
